name: DatabaseConnection
description: Stores database connection information for multiple database types

database_type.description: Type of database (postgresql, mysql, sqlite, mongodb, etc.)

host.description: Database host address (not required for SQLite)

port.description: Database port number (not required for SQLite)

database.description: Database name or file path for SQLite

password.description: Encrypted database password (not required for SQLite)

connection_string.description: Full connection string (alternative to individual fields)

ssl_mode.description: SSL connection mode (for databases that support it)

is_active.description: Whether this connection is currently active
